title: 服务器崩溃求解决
txt_content:
本帖最后由 12344987498496 于 2019-6-1 15:18 编辑 

崩服文件 crash report被这个影响了很多次了
两次都是实体错误崩服的,但是实体是未知的,怎么解决??!!
-- Entity being ticked --Details:        Entity Type: null (net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.EntityLightning)        Entity ID: 18925        Entity Name: unknown        Entity's Exact location: 1044.00, 57.00, 2039.00        Entity's Block location: 1044.00,57.00,2039.00 - World: (1044,57,2039), Chunk: (at 4,3,7 in 65,127; contains blocks 1040,0,2032 to 1055,255,2047), Region: (2,3; contains chunks 64,96 to 95,127, blocks 1024,0,1536 to 1535,255,2047)        Entity's Momentum: 0.00, 0.00, 0.00        Entity's Rider: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null        Entity's Vehicle: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: nullStacktrace:        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.World.tickEntities(World.java:1360)        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.WorldServer.tickEntities(WorldServer.java:597)-- Entity being ticked --
Details:

        Entity's Vehicle: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
Stacktrace:

replies.author: William_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

William_Che 发表于 2019-6-1 15:51
您可尝试删除 /world/region/2,3.mca 文件
没事的吗

如果你的服务端上使用了 Forge
在 config/forge.cfg 中
将 B:removeErroringTileEntities=false 设置为 true
若没有，请用 NBTExplorer、MCEdit 等工具手动移除该实体

replies.author: William_Che
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content: 可以通过NBTexplorer进行对r.2.3.mca文件操作删除未知实体！
